Description: Silver finger-ring; hoop of circular section; cartouche-shaped bezel, possibly with traces of engraving; metal eroded.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Turner Bequest Excavations, Amathus
Bibliographic references: Murray, Smith and Walters 1900 / Excavations in Cyprus (p.120, Tomb 89)
Laffineur et al. 1986 / Amathonte III. Testimonia 3. L'Orfèvrerie. Scarabées, scaraboïdes et cônes. La coupe en argent du British Museum (No. 135, p.35)
